notes.note: Mounting with noatime can improve performance on filesystem heavy workloads by not tracking last accessed dates for files.
Mounting with discard can cause intermittent latency spike when TRIM operations occur
Consider setting the Power and Performance policy to 'performance'
Allowing c-states lower than 1 can cause latency while cpu cores exit an idle state
